original_text: If ye continue in the faith grounded and settled, and be not moved away from the hope of the gospel, which ye have heard, and which was preached to every creature which is under heaven; whereof I Paul am made a minister;
korean_text: 만일 너희가 믿음에 거하고 터 위에 굳게 서서 너희 들은 바 복음의 소망에서 흔들리지 아니하면 그리하리라 이 복음은 천하 만민에게 전파된 바요 나 바울은 이 복음의 일꾼이 되었노라

sentences.original_text: If ye continue in the faith
and be not moved away from the hope of the gospel
and which was preached to every creature
whereof I Paul am made a minister
sentences.korean_translation: 그것으로 인해 나 바울은 일꾼이 되었노라
